title: 1996년 Marriage of O'Neil v. O'Neil 사건
summary: 미국 Montana, MT 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Marriage of O'Neil v. O'Neil. 판결일: 1996-06-04. 법원: Montana Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In RE THE MARRIAGE OF DEBRA S. O’NEIL, Petitioner and Respondent, v. THOMAS E. O’NEIL, Respondent and Appellant
**판결일**: 1996-06-04
**법원**: Montana Supreme Court
**관할**: Montana, MT

**판사**: Erdmann, Hunt, Leaphart, Trieweiler, Turnage

## 변호인

For Appellant: Richard R. Buley, Tipp & Buley, Missoula., For Respondent: Paulette Ferguson, Missoula.

## 인용

- 277 Mont. 13
- 53 State Rptr. 522

## 판결문 요약

                                        No. 95-566
                       IN THE SUPREME COURT OF THE STATE OF MONTANA
                                           1996


            IN RE THE MARRIAGE OF
            DEBRA S. O'NEIL,




            APPEAL FROM:   District Court of the Fourth Judicial District,
                           In and for the County of Missoula,
                           The Honorable John Larson, Judge presiding.


            COUNSEL OF RECORD:
                      For Appellant:
                           Richard R. Buley, Tipp & Buley, Missoula, Montana
                      For Respondent:
                           Paulette Ferguson, Missoula, Montana


                                          Submitted on Briefs:    April 25, 1996
                                                      Decided:    June 4, 1996
            Filed:




I__.,   -     -
 Chief Justice J. A. Turnage delivered the Opinion of the Court.
         Thomas E. O'Neil appeals from this dissolution of marriage

entered in the Fourth Judicial District Court, Missoula County. We

vacate in part and remand.

         The dispositive issue is    whether the court erred in     its
valuation of the marital estate.

         In 1986, just prior to his marriage to Debra S. O'Neil, Thomas

E. O'Neil sold homes he owned in Seattle, Washington, and Twin

Falls,     Idaho,   and land he owned in Lake Tahoe,    Nevada.    With

$110,000 in proceeds from those sales and some cashed-in ret...
